DOC.criteria: Male Aged 1835 year 6575 year 18.5 < BMI < 30 kg/m2 Smoking Performing regular resistance training previous 6 month Hypertension ( accord WHO criterion ) [ 52 ] and/or cardiovascular disease Any back/leg/knee/shoulder complaint may interfere use crutch Systemic use antibiotic within 3 week prior study visit Current systemic use corticosteroid , growth hormone , testosterone , immunosuppressant insulin Type 2 diabetes mellitus Any history thrombosis Any family history ( 1st grade ) thrombosis All comorbidities interact mobility muscle metabolism low limb ( e.g . arthritis , spasticity/rigidity , neurological disorder paralysis ) .
